title: Group for Close Combat Mission
body: Looking to get a group together for close combat please be at least S1 (mostly for your own good I don't want people to get crushed by mmr differences :( ).

replies.body: allsoupedup plat support main can play wherever though
QuicheLorraine here, I am down, add me : )
jungle player here please add me Big Sarge in NA

Unranked Master race, Support Main, Twisted Treeline player reporting in for a test of masochism. . . (>_>)

Also, this should probably be in player recruitment. . .
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment
